content: Hey, Congratulations Harry! Sounds like you're gonna have lots of fun on your new role!
Perfect! Awesome fit! I feel the odds of a PEG example in the official documentation just went through the roof!
Grats Harry on this exciting change!
Congrats & welcome to the team, Harry!
I'm happy for you Harry, but this is a tough loss for our team. You brought a lot to this job and your technical knowledge and insight will be missed.
Glad that we're able to finally get you here ;-)
Congrats and welcome to DevDiv! I'm new in DevDiv myself but I'm working on a part of the .Net Framework as opposed the language teams.

Congrats Harry!  Sorry to see we'll be missing you from the F# community, but I'm now more confident in the DLR community...  Thanks for the link love.

Matt
